input_text:
Job Title: Recruiting/Account Management

Location: Washington, DC

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Marketing, Sales

Description:
Recruiter Position Recruiting is more than an entry-level role; it’s the foundation of your career and the backbone of our company. You must learn the business before you can sell it. The Recruiter role is critical in preparing you for promotion into Account Management and long-term success within the company. On a day-to-day basis, a Recruiter’s main responsibility is to identify the right candidates for our clients’ staffing needs by conducting phone and face to-face interviews through our internal database, job boards, and networking. To find and recommend candidates for positions, our Recruiters must exhibit independent judgment and discretion. In this role, you will improve your business acumen, form a good understanding of technical skillsets and learn how to work with a sense of urgency. While mastering the fundamentals of recruiting, we pair you with an Account Manager who serves as your mentor. The purpose of this relationship is to have a mentor who is invested in your success and will help you grow personally, professionally, and financially. The average promotion takes 6-9 months and is based on merit, not tenure. Account Manager Position Account Managers are the face of our organization. They are responsible for building relationships with hiring managers at Fortune 1000 firms with the goal of making Insight Global their sole staffing services provider. Relationships start through cold calling and networking. Account Managers initially reach out to a prospective client to set up an introductory meeting to learn about their hiring needs and to present our services. They become engrained with the hiring manager by building relationships through meetings, lunches, and out of office events. Account Managers become long-term valued partners to our clients by consistently providing them top-tier talent. We believe that the key to creating a lasting business partnership is through a strong relationship built on trust and unparalleled customer service. Training Account Managers are paired with Recruiters to provide one-on-one mentorshipComprehensive, individualized, on-the-job training allows you to learn at your own paceRecruiter Training at Insight Global University at our Atlanta Headquarters during your third weekContinued education and training offered throughout your career at Insight Global UniversityFuture Leadership Development Program
Compensation and Benefits A Roadmap creates customized plans around employees’ future growth in the companyBase salary + lucrative uncapped commission paid weeklyBenefits packages starting your first day including medical, dental and visionUnlimited Paid Sick DaysEmployee Assistance ProgramCommuter BenefitsParental Leave RepresentativeDiscounts at Retailers NationwideHolidays and paid time offPromotions to management positions only come from withinExpense account for business-related expenses upon promotion to Account ManagerMonthly car and cell phone allowance upon promotion to Account Manager401k/Roth 401k eligibility after 90 days of employmentHalf-day & Full-day Fridays off (contingent upon maintaining weekly spread)Annual Sales Contest eligibility, which includes IUPs, year-end bonus and incentive trips
70 Offices Across North America:Atlanta, GAAustin, TXBaltimore, MDBentonville, ARBirmingham, ALBoston, MACharlotte, NCChicago, ILCincinnati, OHCleveland, OHColumbus, OHDallas, TXDenver, CODes Moines, IADetroit, MIFt. Lauderdale, FLGrand Rapids, MIHartford, CTHouston, TXIndianapolis, INJacksonville, FLKansas City, MOKing of Prussia, PALos Angeles, CALouisville, KYMiami, FLMilwaukee, WIMinneapolis, MNNashville, TNMorristown, NJNew York, NYNorfolk, VAIrvine, CAOrlando, FLPhiladelphia, PAPhoenix, AZPittsburgh, PAPortland, ORRaleigh, NCRichmond, VASacramento, CASalt Lake City, UTSan Antonio, TXSan Diego, CASan Francisco, CASan Jose, CASeattle, WAStamford, CTSt. Louis, MOTampa, FLToronto, Ontario CanadaVancouver, British Columbia CanadaWashington, D.C.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Recruiting/Account Management
output_json.summary: A foundational role in the company's career path, focusing on learning business fundamentals before moving into Account Management.
job_responsibilities: Identify right candidates for staffing needs
Utilize internal database, job boards, and networking
Promotion within 6-9 months based on merit
benefits: Monthly car and cell phone allowance
Half-day & full-day Fridays off contingent upon maintaining weekly spread

other.content: Mentorship from Account Manager, comprehensive on-the-job training, training at Insight Global University, future leadership development program

Customized growth plans, base salary + lucrative uncapped commission, weekly payments, benefits packages starting day one, unlimited paid sick days, employee assistance program, commuter benefits, parental leave, discounts at retailers, holidays and paid time off, expense account for business-related expenses, monthly car and cell phone allowance, 401k/Roth 401k eligibility after 90 days, half-day & full-day Fridays off contingent upon maintaining weekly spread, annual sales contest
